text: Khamis Al-Owairan Al-Dosari (; 8 September 1973 â€“ 7 January 2020) was a Saudi Arabian footballer. He played as a midfielder. Al-Dosari was born in Riyadh. He played most of his career for Al-Hilal and Al-Ittihad. He also played for the Saudi Arabia national team and was a squad member at the 1996 Summer Olympics and the 1998 and 2002 FIFA World Cup. Al-Dosari died of brain cancer on 7 January 2020. He was 46. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1973 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from brain cancer Category:People from Riyadh Category:Saudi Arabian footballers Category:1996 Summer Olympics Category:1998 FIFA World Cup players Category:2002 FIFA World Cup players Category:Al Hilal SFC players
title: Khamis Al-Owairan
